data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xiaoyan, Nartshuk, Emilia P., Yang, Ding (2017): Chromatopterum (Diptera, Chloropidae), a newly recorded genus from China, and description of two new species. Zootaxa 4306 (2): 279-286, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.2.8|10 occurrences
